name: Kankhal Ashram
history: The Kankhal Ashram is one of the main centers established during Sri Sri Maa's lifetime. It holds immense spiritual significance as Maa spent considerable time here.
significance: Main Centre - Historic location where Maa gave countless darshans and teachings.

visitingInfo.stayOptions: Guest rooms available with prior booking
visitingInfo.guidelines: Please maintain silence in meditation areas. Photography is not allowed in the Samadhi shrine.

name: Varanasi Ashram
history: Established in the holy city of Kashi, this ashram serves as a spiritual haven for devotees visiting the ancient city.
significance: Important center for spiritual practices and satsangs

name: Dehradun Kanyapeeth
history: The Kanyapeeth (girls' school) established under Maa's inspiration to provide spiritual education along with modern learning.
significance: Educational center dedicated to holistic development
